#id=1
#text=My family recently moved to a new home with a bland and boring yard .
#id=2
#text=We decided to plant some trees to spice up the place , so my mother , father , siblings and I all packed ourselves into the SUV and drove to a nearby nursery .
#id=3
#text=We looked at many different types of trees before settling on the apple trees .
#id=4
#text=We bought several baby apple trees and took them home for planting .
#id=5
#text=First , my father and older brother dug large holes in the ground .
#id=6
#text=I wanted to help , but they said I was too young to hold the shovel !
#id=7
#text=After the holes were dug , the apple trees were placed inside .
#id=8
#text=Then , we shoveled dirt into the holes to fix the apple trees in place .
#id=9
#text=I was allowed to help with that , thankfully .
#text=After all that , our baby apple trees were planted in the ground and we were all very excited to see what they would look like as they grew up .
